question:
In the vicinity of Mumbai, a number of specialized towns have been developed. Match the lists of specialization with towns and select the correct answer using the codes given below the lists :
List I List II
(Towns) (Specialisation)
I. Alibag (A) Fishing Centre
II. Balapur (B) Holiday resort
III. Nhava Sheva (C) Petro-chemical complex
IV. Ratnagiri (D) Port
Codes:
explanation:
Alibag                – Holiday Resort
Balapur              – Fishing Centre
Nhave Sheva     – Port
Ratnagiri            – Petrochemical complex
